titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Undergraduate Studies, Yale College, Records of the Dean
Undergraduate Studies, Yale College, Records of the Dean
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:07

did.unittitle: Undergraduate Studies, Yale College, records of the dean

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of reports, committee records, correspondence, regulations, and chronological files of Martin Griffin as dean of undergraduate studies of Yale College. Included are records on the Executive Committee, the Yale College Council, the residential deanships, discipline, the Buckley Amendment, athletics, and prizes.

origination.label: creator
origination.persname: Griffin, Martin I. J. (Martin Ignatius Joseph), 1933-1988

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-B (YRG 9-B), Records of deputy, associate, and assistant deans of Yale College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Undergraduate Studies, Yale College, Records of the Dean (RU 214). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports, committee records, correspondence, regulations, and chronological files of Martin Griffin as dean of undergraduate studies of Yale College. Included are records on the Executive Committee, the Yale College Council, the residential deanships, discipline, the Buckley Amendment, athletics, and prizes.

did.unittitle: Records of Martin Griffin as dean

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
